輞字的基本解释

輞
wǎng
见“辋”。

輞字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wǎng］
［《廣韻》文兩切，上養，微。］
亦作“棢1”。“辋1”的繁体字。亦作“1”。
(1)车轮的外框。
(2)宫殿屋檐上的环状饰物。

輞字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輞； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1244第31
【廣韻】文兩切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】文紡切，?音罔。【玉篇】車輞也。【韻會】車輞，車之牙輞輮也。【釋名】輞，网也，謂网羅周輪之外也。【後漢·輿服志】天子獵車，重輞縵綸，繆龍繞之。　又輞川，地名。太原王摩詰別墅有輞川圖。

[①]［wǎng］
["Guangyun" essay is divided into two parts, upper support, micro. ]
Also known as "棢1". The traditional characters of "Wang1". Also known as "1".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Youji 2] [Car Character Department] 　wang; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 1244 to 31
[Guang Yun] Two cuts of the text [Jiyun] [Rhyme] [Zheng Yun] The cut of the text, the sound? 【Jade articles】Car rims are also. [Rhyme Club] Car rims, car teeth rims are also. 【Release name】Rim, net also means that the net is outside the circle. [Later Han·Yufuzhi] The emperor hunts a car, and he relies heavily on Manlun, and Miao Long walks around it.　You Wangchuan, place name. Wangmojie Villa in Taiyuan has a map of Wangchuan.
